channel.title: Comments on: Building a SharePoint 2013 BI Demo Environment Part 3 â€“ Installing the OS
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Koen Verbeeck
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.description:
Hi Lorenzo,
all the configurations I have done are described in this article. The most important ones are probably network configuration and possibly the firewall. Also make sure you have the correct version of the .NET framework, as this is needed to install SQL Server.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Lorenzo,

all the configurations I have done are described in this article.
The most important ones are probably network configuration and possibly the firewall.
Also make sure you have the correct version of the .NET framework, as this is needed to install SQL Server.

item.title: By: Lorenzo
item.dc:creator: Lorenzo
item.description: Great article Koen! I am doing the walk through but I am little confused. After I install windows server 2012 I am given the server manager window. If we are wanting to setup a minor demo environment for practice how would we configure the local server? Any help would be greatly appreciated as I am newbie at windows server 2012.
item.content:encoded: Great article Koen! I am doing the walk through but I am little confused. After I install windows server 2012 I am given the server manager window. If we are wanting to setup a minor demo environment for practice how would we configure the local server? Any help would be greatly appreciated as I am newbie at windows server 2012.
